Here at South, one can find over 40 different clubs. Debate club. Key Club. Business Club. Physics Club. Whether a Pirate is a musician, an academic, an aspiring politician, South has a place for them to prepare for their future.

The bell rings at 10:50 a.m. and students scramble up their belongings and hurry out of their classrooms. The hallways quickly fill with the bustle of students rushing to their next class and, on the other hand, those leisurely strolling to lunch.

Filipinx-American-history-month.description: Although often overlooked, Filipinx-Americans have had a hand in American history for centuries. Because May is Pan Asian American Heritage Month, Lunar New Year, the most important holiday for many Asian countries, deserves to be highlighted.
